message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great deal, considering its worth to you is $1500000. I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to me is $1500000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
